news.title: 特朗普怒斥军方高层对伊朗动武警告
news.title0: Trump hits out at reports that top US general warned against attacking Iran
news.content: 特朗普驳斥了其最高军事顾问警告对伊朗空袭风险的报道，称该将军认为战争将“轻易获胜”。
news.content0: President Donald Trump has lashed out at reports that his top military adviser had urged caution on air strikes against Iran, saying the general believes it would be "easily won".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国巧克力被锁进防盗盒防“订单式盗窃”
news.title0: Chocolate kept in anti-theft boxes as shops warn it's being stolen to order
news.content: 英国部分商店将巧克力棒锁入塑料盒，零售商和警方警告称，窃贼正按订单进行盗窃。
news.content0: Chocolate bars are being locked in plastic boxes in some UK shops as retailers and police forces warn thieves are stealing them to order.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 俄士兵向BBC披露曾目睹指挥官下令处决拒战同袍
news.title0: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
news.content: 四名俄罗斯士兵向BBC讲述了前线目睹的恐怖与残酷，包括指挥官下令处决拒绝命令的士兵。
news.content0: Warning: This story contains details of extreme violence and reference to suicide.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美政府撤销对民主党议员“非法命令”视频案指控
news.title0: US government drops case against Democrats in 'illegal orders' video
news.content: 联邦检察官撤销了对六名民主党议员的指控，他们曾发布视频呼吁军人拒绝执行非法命令。
news.content0: Federal prosecutors in Washington have dropped their case against six Democratic lawmakers who released a video urging military servicemembers to refuse illegal orders.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美驻法大使与法外长通话缓和外交风波
news.title0: US ambassador to France set for talks with foreign minister after row
news.content: 美驻法大使库什纳与法外长通话，承诺不干涉法国内政，双方同意未来几日会面。
news.content0: The US ambassador to France, Charles Kushner, has reportedly assured French Foreign Minister Jean-Noel Barrot he will not interfere in the country's affairs, after he failed to explain claims France had seen a "rise" in violence.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 巴黎圣日耳曼球星哈基米被下令就强奸案受审
news.title0: Judge orders PSG soccer star Achraf Hakimi to stand trial in rape case, lawyer says appeal planned
news.content: 巴黎圣日耳曼和摩洛哥后卫阿什拉夫·哈基米被法官下令就强奸案接受审判，其律师表示将上诉。
news.content0: Paris Saint-Germainand Morocco defender Achraf Hakimi has been ordered to stand trial in a rape case, lawyers told the Associated Press on Tuesday.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 五角大楼威胁AI公司若不解除安全限制将遭封杀
news.title0: Pentagon threatens to make Anthropic a pariah if it refuses to drop AI guardrails
news.content: 美国防部威胁AI公司Anthropic，若不在期限内解除其AI模型的安全限制，将终止合同并可能将其列入黑名单。
news.content0: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth gave Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei a Friday deadline to comply with demands to peel back safeguards on its AI model or risk losing a Pentagon contract.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 卢浮宫馆长在王室珠宝失窃案后辞职
news.title0: Louvre Director Resigns, Months After Burglars Stole Crown Jewels
news.content: 卢浮宫首位女馆长劳伦斯·德·卡尔斯在博物馆发生王室珠宝失窃案后辞职，法国总统已接受其辞呈。
news.content0: Laurence des Cars, the first female president of the Louvre Museum, resigned on Tuesday, less than five months afteran audacious theftraised thorny questions about security at one of the world’s most famous museums.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 伊朗民众在战争威胁下囤积物资准备逃离
news.title0: Iranians Brace for War Beneath Veneer of Normalcy
news.content: 随着美伊谈判进入关键阶段，部分伊朗民众开始打包应急物资、购买发电机，或计划逃往乡村及国外。
news.content0: For days, the fate of roughly 90 million Iranians has appeared to swing between war and peace as American and Iranian officials traded threats of attack and calls for diplomacy.
news.author: NYTimes
